title: Climatic and non-climatic factors driving the livelihood vulnerability of smallholder farmers in Ahafo Ano North District, Ghana
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Regional Sustainability, Volume 5, Issue 3

Author(s): Frank Baffour-Ata, Louisa Boakye, Moses Tilatob Gado, Ellen Boakye-Yiadom, Sylvia Cecilia Mensah, Senyo Michael Kwaku Kumfo, Kofi Prempeh Osei Owusu, Emmanuel Carr, Emmanuel Dzikunu, Patrick Davies
